question: Who has conferred with the Digital Leader of the Year during the Businessworld Digital India Summit Award 2018 in New Delhi?
explanation: The Minister of IT, Panchayat Raj and Rural Development of Andhra Pradesh Shri Nara Lokesh has received an award for 'Digital Leader of the Year'. This award was given during the Businessworld Digital India Summit Award 2018 held in New Delhi. This award was announced for the best utilization of technology governance and Nara Lokesh got it for development of the rural sector and water supply departments. The state Panchayat Raj and Rural Water Supply Department officials have won another award for the ultramodern tracking system for water supply program.
